ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from entering a Follow Up Date value prior than the current date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), (ISCHANGED(Follow_Up_Date__c)), ( Follow_Up_Date__c < TODAY() ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot set the Follow Up Date to a date prior than today
